<class name="SubOrientedPoint" extends="AbstractSubHyperplane" startLine="24">
* This class represents sub-hyperplane for {@link OrientedPoint}. *
An hyperplane in 1D is a simple point, its orientation being a * boolean. *
Instances of this class are guaranteed to be immutable. $Id: SubOrientedPoint.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 3.0
* Simple constructor. hyperplane underlying hyperplane remainingRegion remaining region of the hyperplane
* {@inheritDoc}
* {@inheritDoc}
<method type="AbstractSubHyperplane" name="buildNew" startLine="51" endLine="53" />
* {@inheritDoc}
* {@inheritDoc}
<method type="SplitSubHyperplane" name="split" startLine="64" endLine="69">
